name: redux-reducer-injection
description: Sharing a Redux store across remote apps with dynamic reducer injection; 'app1' hosts and creates the store, 'app2' injects its reducer.

scripts.e2e:ci: pnpm start & sleep 5 && wait-on tcp:3001 && wait-on tcp:3002 && npx cypress run --config-file ../cypress-e2e/config/cypress.config.ts --config '{"supportFile": "../cypress-e2e/support/e2e.ts"}' --spec "./e2e/*.cy.ts" --browser=chrome
